contents.text: Thank you for calling MuleSoft in San Francisco, the leader in cloud and on-premise application integration.
Press 1 to speak with our Sales team about connecting your SaaS and enterprise applications.
Press 1 to learn more about Mule ESB.
Please hold while we connect you to a Sales representative specializing in Mule ESB.

navigationGoals: Discuss licensing and implementation timeline for integrating our on-premise and SaaS apps with Mule ESB.
I want pricing and licensing details for Mule ESB to integrate our veteran services system.
Discuss Mule ESB licensing and integration for our hybrid SaaS/on-prem architecture
I need to speak with someone who can help me use your enterprise service bus to connect my applications.
I’m interested in purchasing Mule ESB for my university lab project to integrate experimental sensor data with our cloud services—could you connect me with Sales for pricing and licensing?

contents.text: Press 2 to learn more about CloudHub.
Please hold while we connect you to a Sales representative specializing in CloudHub.

navigationGoals: Get a quote and migration plan for moving our integrations to CloudHub.
I want to learn how to use CloudHub to host my veteran support portal.
Inquire about CloudHub PaaS pricing and API gateway capabilities
I’d like information on moving my integrations to your cloud platform and how it works.
I’d like to learn how CloudHub can support my physics data pipeline for running simulations and what subscription options are available.

contents.text: Press 2 for Customer Support and technical assistance.
Press 1 for help with deployment and configuration.
Your call is important to us, please hold for a technical support engineer.

navigationGoals: Walk me through setting up and configuring my MuleSoft deployment.
I need help deploying and configuring MuleSoft connectors on my server.
Get technical support configuring and deploying Mule runtime in our environment
I need technical support to help me deploy and configure my applications.
I need help setting up and configuring Mule ESB on our department’s server cluster for my graduate research project.

contents.text: Press 2 for troubleshooting and maintenance queries.
Your call is important to us, please hold for our maintenance support team.

navigationGoals: Help me identify and resolve errors in my production integration flows.
I need assistance troubleshooting and maintaining my live MuleSoft integration environment.
Troubleshoot performance bottlenecks and schedule maintenance for our integration flows
I need help with troubleshooting and maintaining my current system setup.
I’m encountering errors in my Mule ESB flows in production and need troubleshooting and maintenance support to resolve them.
